title.value: Use of supplements based on tripoli in diets for young cattle
Использование добавок на основе трепела в рационах молодняка крупного рогатого скота

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shnitko, E.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: It is determined that the use of mineral supplement of tripoli with probiotic, prebiotic and synbiotics in feeds for young cattle has a positive effect on the physiological condition of the animals that is proved by a morphological and biochemical composition of blood. Inclusion of studied fodder additives (№1 - 1,5% tripoli +  probiotic Biomix-Vet, №2 - 2% tripoli + prebiotic Biomos, №3 - 2,5% tripoli + symbiotic (Biomix + Biomos)in rations of young growth of large horned livestock provides increase daily average gain alive weight on 5,6-12,1%. The highest efficiency is received at animals in compound fodder structure of which the fodder additive consisting of sorbent and symbiotic entered
